channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-14895] CompactorMR.CompactorOutputCommitter race condition
item.description:
commitJob() method renames each file in TMP_LOCATION separately. so someone may read FINAL_LOCATION and see only some of the files that should be there.
Use FileSystem.getFileStatus(TMP_LOCATION) and just rename the dir.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: I'm moving this JIRA out of 2.1.1 release as it is not a blocker nor critical for a 2.1.1 RC version. Feel free to commit it to branch 2.1 if the patch is ready before the release.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12841676/HIVE-14895.02.patch
